summary: Destiny makes two brothers- Ranvir and Rajiv - enemies of each other. Everything is fair in love and war.
cast: Saif Ali Khan|Akshaye Khanna|Bipasha Basu|Katrina Kaif|Anil Kapoor|Sameera Reddy|Gurpreet Ghuggi|Johnny Lever|Dalip Tahil|Natalie Walsh|Melissa Brouard|Matt Dworzanczyk
director: Directors: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla (as Abbas-Mastan), Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla (as Abbas-Mastan)
title: Race
